game.title: Find the Ancient Artifact
game.objective: Locate and obtain the ancient artifact hidden inside the mysterious cave.
game.description: Legend tells of a powerful artifact hidden away in a cave guarded by mythical creatures. Your task is to find this artifact and bring it back.

task.description: Travel to the Whispering Hills and find the entrance to the cave.
Clear the cave by defeating all the guardians at the entrance.
Explore the cave, solve puzzles, and locate the powerful ancient artifact inside.
